observe_name: Arrival of vessel at the observed system
Transfert at port of a crew member
Fake set, for hosting historical samples
End of fishing (skiff is brought on board)
Steaming at night towards a floating object
Training on board (priracy, fire, abandonment, etc)
Operation on FOB only (visit, deployment, modification, retrieval)
comment:
If the activities with code 13 have a localisation, then they count for the fishing time allocation, except for one (the fishing on FOB activity having already been taken into account via its elementary catch).
Otherwise, fishing_time=0 for activities with code 13, but whose longitude and latitude have not been recorded.

observe_name: Searching for floating objects (logs or FADs)
Steaming towards observed system associated to the tuna school
Drifting during the day near a tuna school, a log or a FAD
Continue steaming towards observed system associated to the tuna school
Recovering a floating object (log or FAD) belonging to the vessel
Recovering a floating object (log or FAD) that does not belong to the vessel
Anchorage on top of a seamount
Transshipping at sea (equipment, FADs, crew member)
Activity/set created from the well plan
